messages.title: Dear Voter
messages.content: I am a retired Magistrate, and Bishop Auckland is my home. I have lived in Binchester for over 20 years.

messages.title: How we can change the future together
messages.content: It's time for someone new. Someone who puts the community first, not the party first.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest in schools to ensure no child is left behind.
Tackle climate change and invest in renewable energy.
Build a strong economy and share prosperity.
Implement an Australian-style points-based immigration system.
Focus on community policing to keep our streets safe.
Build a fairer society and help the most vulnerable with a £50 billion Regional Rebalancing Programme for infrastructure and innovation.

issues.economy: Build a strong economy and share prosperity.
issues.education: Invest in schools to ensure no child is left behind.
issues.environment: Tackle climate change and invest in renewable energy.
issues.health: Spend £7 billion extra per year on the NHS.
issues.immigration: Implement an Australian-style points-based immigration system.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am a retired Magistrate, and Bishop Auckland is my home. I have lived in Binchester for over 20 years.

images.caption: Rhys Burriss - Standing Up for Real Change
